user_request: A poem for Valentine's Day about true love lasting forever.
final_poem:
Eternal flame that burns so bright,
Guiding us through life's darkest night.
A love so pure, it shines like gold,
Forever entwined, young and old.

In whispers shared on quiet nights,
Promises made with loving lights,
Together we dance under starry skies,
Hand in hand, our hearts abide.

Time may take its toll and fade,
But true love's strength will never stray.
For in each other's eyes, we see,
A forever love that sets us free.
